item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 08 Aug 2023
item.description:
1. dune 3.9.0
  2. Dune 3.10.0
  3. decimal 1.0.0
  4. earlybird 1.2.0 â€“ revival of a debugger
  5. First release candidate for OCaml 5.1.0
  6. Revamp the getting started tutorials in ocaml.org
  7. First alpha release of Simple_httpd
  8. Cairn: A derivation explorer and logger for Menhir Parser
  9. OCaml Workshop 2023 -- presentation deadline on June 1st, online attendance option
  10. 13th MirageOS retreat in Marrakesh, Morocco (November 20th - 26th 2023)
  11. kcas and kcas_data 0.6.1: STM and compositional lock-dree data structures
